description: Visulization for monitoring Azure AI Foundry usage and latency across model deployments in a single Grafana dashboard.

panels.description: Estimated cost calculated from input and output token usage with model-specific pricing
panels.title: Estimated Cost by model

panels.description: Number of prompt tokens processed (input) on a model. Applies to PTU, PTU-Managed and Pay-as-you-go deployments.
panels.title: Input Tokens

panels.description: Number of tokens generated (output) from an OpenAI model. Applies to PTU, PTU-Managed and Pay-as-you-go deployments.
panels.title: Output Tokens

panels.description: Number of calls made to the Azure OpenAI API over a period of time. Applies to PTU, PTU-Managed and Pay-as-you-go deployments.
panels.title: Model requests

panels.description: Number of inference tokens processed on a model. Calculated as prompt tokens (input) plus generated tokens (output). Applies to PTU, PTU-Managed and Pay-as-you-go deployments.
panels.title: Total Tokens

panels.description: Number of prompt tokens processed (input) on a model. Applies to PTU, PTU-Managed and Pay-as-you-go deployments.
panels.title: Input Tokens

panels.description: Number of tokens generated (output) from an OpenAI model. Applies to PTU, PTU-Managed and Pay-as-you-go deployments.
panels.title: Output Tokens

panels.description: For streaming and non-streaming requests; time it takes for last byte of response data to be received after request is made by model. Applies to PTU, PTU-managed, and Pay-as-you-go deployments.
panels.title: Time to Last Byte

list.description: Subscription of the Azure AI Foundry
list.label: Subscription
list.name: subscriptionId

title: AI Foundry
